channel.title: Error when Running Server (Run.bat)
channel.description:
Ok so my Server is "Delta" Based and it's "317", Recently it has started showing an error when I click on the "Run.Bat" [size=36pt][/size][code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2888) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:29 at server.main(server.java:35)[/code] I have looking in the "NPCHandler.java" file but cannot seem to locate the Problem (Probably Because I have no idea what that Error Means) I have Googled it and Found Nothing, Any Help would be Good, THANKS in Advance!
Edit: I have Deleted my Delta Based 317 Server and me and my Mate have got a Blank 562 Source + Client and Coding a Brand New Server!

item.title: Error when Running Server (Run.bat)
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

wrong, u have a bad line in autospawn.cfg or npcdrops.cfg. Go back and review those.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“Guhtwables, post:4, topic:403612”]That means theres { Out of line. Go to line i think 2888 ( ctrl+g ) and tab the { with the others.[/quote] i have tried this and It comes up with the same error…

Read full topic

item.title: Error when Running Server (Run.bat)
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

Ok so my Server is “Delta” Based and it’s “317”, Recently it has started showing an error when I click on the “Run.Bat”
[size=36pt][/size]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2888) at NPCHandler.(init)(NPCHandler.java:29 at server.main(server.java:35)
I have looking in the “NPCHandler.java” file but cannot seem to locate the Problem
(Probably Because I have no idea what that Error Means) I have Googled it and Found Nothing, Any Help would be Good,
THANKS in Advance!

Edit: I have Deleted my Delta Based 317 Server and me and my Mate have got a Blank 562 Source + Client and Coding a Brand New Server!

Read full topic
